Commands.Aim: 1-HIT BRV attack that cannot miss.  Grants Small Attack Up for 3 turns if the target is debuffed.  Low Action Delay.
Commands.Attack Boost: Grants Medium Attack Up and Medium Critical Rate Up for 2 turns to an ally.  Low Action Delay.
Commands.HP Attack+: 1-HIT BRV+HP attack with low Action Delay.
Commands.Boost Advance All: Slightly raises party Max BRV overflow limit for 3 turns.  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count

Passives.High Tension: Slightly raises Attack for 3 turns when the battle starts.
Passives.Aim Charge: Increases the max uses of Aim by 1.
Passives.A Father's Pride: Grants a low probability of gaining a Small Max BRV Up buff for 3 turns after a BRV Attack.
Passives.Critical BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after dealing a critical hit.
Passives.Attack Boost Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Attack Boost.
Passives.Aim Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Aim.
Passives.Attack Boost Charge: Increases the max uses of Attack Boost by 1.
Passives.A Father's Nature: Grants +1 turn to pre-existing buffs when buffing allies.
Passives.Start Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 3 turns when the battle starts.
Passives.Aim Extend: Increases Aim's max uses by 2.Increases its number of hits to 2.Tremendously raises its total potency.Triggers an HP attack after use.
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and Attack while buffed.
Passives.Attack Boost Extend: Grants the effects of Attack Boost to all party members.Slightly raises the potency of Attack Up.Raises party's BRV based on Attack.Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ for 6 turns.BRV Attack+ is a 1-HIT stronger BRV attack.
Passives.Resonance of Bravery and Destruction: Raises party's Initial BRV and Max BRV by 10%.
Passives.Boost Advance All Extend: When using Boost Advance All, adds the following effect:- Slightly raises party's Attack.

Weapons.Spica CP: 35: Increases Attack Boost's max uses by 1.Improves Attack Up and Critical Rate Up and extends their duration.Grants Medium Max BRV Up to target for 6 turns.Grants Medium Max BRV Up, Medium Attack Up, Large Critical Rate up and Medium Speed Up to self for 6 turns.Turns HP Attack to HP Attack+ for 6 turns.
Weapons.Altair CP: 15: Increases Aim's potency.Extends Attack Up's duration.Grants Small Defense Up for 4 turns when the target is debuffed.
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Increases the max uses of Boost Advance All by 1.Extends the duration of its effects by 2 turns.
